item.title: about:joel
item.description: TLDR: Apple has added some extra request IDs to the Companion-Link protocol that's used to talk between Apple devices and the HomePod Mini. These keys show that it's possible to check whether temperature and humidity measuring is enabled, and fetch readings if it is. I'm working on reverse engineering the protocol, plan to publish more soon, and this would be great to get into something like HomeAssistant.
item.author: (Joel Snape)
